title: Update Signature Transformative Work cards (links, previews, and Fancy Studios addition)

requirements.summary: Update the “ROLLAPPS ON SOLANA — EthCC” card to use the luma.com URL and enable its LinkPreview.
acceptanceCriteria: The “ROLLAPPS ON SOLANA — EthCC” card renders a LinkPreview using https://luma.com/jl85cn4t (i.e., showPreview is enabled and link is the luma.com URL).
Clicking the card’s “Open” action opens https://luma.com/jl85cn4t in a new browser tab (target="_blank" with rel="noopener noreferrer").

file_operations.description: In the signals array, update the “ROLLAPPS ON SOLANA — EthCC” item: set link to https://luma.com/jl85cn4t and set showPreview to true so the existing LinkPreview rendering path is enabled; confirm the Open action continues to use the same link with target="_blank" and rel="noopener noreferrer".

requirements.summary: Update the “COINTELEGRAPH — Opinion Contributor” card to use the Cointelegraph author URL and enable its LinkPreview.
acceptanceCriteria: The “COINTELEGRAPH — Opinion Contributor” card renders a LinkPreview using https://cointelegraph.com/authors/shailey-singh.
Clicking the card’s “Open” action opens https://cointelegraph.com/authors/shailey-singh in a new browser tab (target="_blank" with rel="noopener noreferrer").

file_operations.description: In the signals array, update the “COINTELEGRAPH — Opinion Contributor” item: set link to https://cointelegraph.com/authors/shailey-singh and set showPreview to true so the existing LinkPreview rendering path is enabled; confirm the Open action continues to use the same link with target="_blank" and rel="noopener noreferrer".

requirements.summary: Add the “FANCY STUDIOS — Gaming Creativity” card next to the Cointelegraph card with LinkPreview enabled and an Open action that opens in a new tab.
acceptanceCriteria: A new “FANCY STUDIOS — Gaming Creativity” card appears in the “Signature Transformative Work” grid next to the Cointelegraph card (i.e., nearby/adjacent in the grid layout).
The new card displays an italic category line exactly “Blockchain gaming”.
The new card description text matches exactly: “Built the marketing function from 0→1, defining strategy, processes across content, design, PR, and community.”
The new card renders a LinkPreview using https://fancy-studios.gitbook.io/whitepaper.
Clicking the new card’s “Open” action opens https://fancy-studios.gitbook.io/whitepaper in a new browser tab (target="_blank" with rel="noopener noreferrer").

file_operations.description: Add a new item to the signals array adjacent to the “COINTELEGRAPH — Opinion Contributor” item (place it immediately before or after it to ensure adjacency in the existing 2-column grid): title “FANCY STUDIOS — Gaming Creativity”, category “Blockchain gaming” (rendered in italics by the existing markup), description exactly “Built the marketing function from 0→1, defining strategy, processes across content, design, PR, and community.”, link https://fancy-studios.gitbook.io/whitepaper, and showPreview true so LinkPreview renders; ensure the existing Open action uses the same link with target="_blank" and rel="noopener noreferrer".
